What we did with Test Mentor - Java Edition is create a set of generic
objects that you configure for executing methods, constructors or
accessing/setting fields. These objects transparently take care of all the
reflection stuff for you. You set up these objects with code or with a
special visual test composition UI provided by the tool, or through test
generation from recorded object interactions. More info at
www.javatesting.com
